#Importazione dataset:
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(explore)
library(dplyr) 

# Get the Data
colony <- read.csv("../data/colony.csv")
stressor <- read.csv("../data/stressor.csv")
cleaned_data <- read.csv("../data/cleaned_data.csv")
cleaned_data_final=read.csv('cleaned_final_data.csv')
```

```{r create cleaned_data_final}
data_bees <- read_csv("data/new_data/data_bees.csv")

new_data <- data_bees %>% tidyr::pivot_wider(
  names_from = 'Data Item', 
  values_from = Value,
  values_fill = NULL
)

bee_data <- new_data[!is.na(new_data$`HONEY, BEE COLONIES, RENOVATED - INVENTORY, MEASURED IN COLONIES`),]
bee_data <- bee_data %>% select(-`Week Ending`, -`Ag District`, -`Ag District Code`, -County,-`County ANSI`,-`Zip Code`,-Region, -Watershed, -`CV (%)`, -`HONEY, BEE COLONIES, RENOVATED - INVENTORY, MEASURED IN COLONIES`, -`HONEY, BEE COLONIES - INVENTORY, MEASURED IN COLONIES`)
write.csv(bee_data,"cleaned_final_data.csv")
```
